sentences.sContent: Or you can choose to accelerate your growth and intentionally devour life and all it offers.
sentences.sContent_eng: Or you can choose to accelerate your growth and intentionally devour life and all it offers.
sentences.sCn: 又或许你可以选择加速自己的成长，故意地挥霍生活及其提供的一切。

sentences.sContent: The prevalence of these widgets means they can report on almost all your browsing activity, which can then be linked to databases full of the social data you intentionally share.
sentences.sContent_eng: The prevalence of these widgets means they can report on almost all your browsing activity, which can then be linked to databases full of the social data you intentionally share.
sentences.sCn: 这些工具的盛行率意味着他们可以报告几乎所有你的浏览活动，然后将它们连接到充满你有意分享的社交数据的数据库中。

words.tran: 专心地；一心一意地；心无旁物地
